subject: Rugby (Game)
World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: When Leinster won the Heineken Cup last weekend, Brad Thorn became the first player to win a Rugby World Cup, a Super Rugby title and the Heineken Cup.
snippet: When Leinster won the Heineken Cup last weekend, Brad Thorn became the first player to win a Rugby World Cup, a Super Rugby title and the Heineken Cup.
